org.icemoon.EarthEternal org.icemoon.EarthEternal.desktop CC0-1.0 â€‹ Earth Eternal Emerald Icemoon An MMORPG set in a world where humans no longer exist. LicenseRef-proprietary
Now a fan run game, Earth Eternal is an abandoned MMORPG based on the OGRE 3D engine.
The current release is 'Earth Eternal - Valkal's Shadow', which includes 2 whole new regions, lots more quests and a bunch of new dungeons..
Alpha release of the brand new Linux port!
